text: ara yena tomadera prabhura kache paritrana khomjo, tarapara tamra dike phero, -- tini tomadera sundara jibanopakarana upabhoga karate debena eka nirdista kalera jan'ya, ara tini pratyeka pracuryera adhikarike tamra pracurya pradana karena. Ara yadi tomara phire ya'o tabe nihsandeha ami tomadera jan'ya asanka kari eka mahadinera sastira.
